thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: jetpilot7

author: jetpilot7
title: jetpilot7
text: Hi just like to say how positive my dealings with Banggood.com have been.All the items I have bought on Banggood have been of good quality and reasonably priced.One small item was lost temporarily in transit but turned up later.Banggod supplied second item straight away.A totally reliable website for Australians to purchase items from overseas. Being able to pay through PayPal is very good.Thanks for looking after me Banggood.
